rukus.text: Litika lyakwe (½), kapena mpungusye mwitikamo panandi
Kapena n'jonjechesye petikalyo, ni nsoomeje Qur’an mwaakosowalila
Chisimu Uwwe chituntuluchisye mmwejo lilowe lyausito
Chisimu kwimuchila chilo (kuswali) nikwakuli kwakwinjilisya nnope (mu ntima), soni yakuwecheta yakwe ikasawaga yagoloka kusyene
Chisimu mmwejo muusi nkwete ipaka yejinji
Ni likumbuchilani lina lya Ambuje wenu (Allah pakulikolanga), soni lipelekani Kukwakwe nalipelekape
M'mbuje jwa kungopoko ni kungapililo, pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ikaweje Jwalakwe, basi muntendani kuwa Nkun'jegama
Soni pililani pa yaakuwecheta (achimakafili), ni mwawambalani kuwambala kwambone
Soni munekaani Une ni wakanila achinsyene ukoto (wa duniya), gambani kwalechelela panandipe (timalane nao)
Chisimu Kukwetu kwana matondolo gakulimbangana ni Moto Waukali
Ni yakulya yakwama (palukosi) kwisa soni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
Lisiku lya lichitenganyika litaka kwisa soni matumbi, ni gachiwa matumbigo chisau liunjili lya nsanga wakupwelembwesuka
Chisimu Uwwe tutumisye kukwenu Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) kuwa mboni pa jenumanja, mpela yatwatite pakutumisya kwa Afiriauna Ntenga (Musa)
Nambo Afiriauna wannyosyisye Ntengajo, basi ni twaakwembekenye ni ilagasyo yakandapala kusyene
Ana chin'digose chinauli (ku ipotesi) naga nkulikanila Lisiku lyalichitendekasya wanache kola wuuli
Liwunde lichipasuka mu lyele Lisikuli (ligongo lya kogoya kwakwe), chilanga Chakwe (Allah) chichiwa chakutendekwa (mwangalepeleka)
Chisimu galakwe (ma Ayaga) gawele chikumbusyo, basi jwaakusaka aliikolochesye chilepe litala lyakuujila kwa M'bujegwe
